snippet: The government supporters said they were prepared to thwart any move to dismiss Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, who faces mounting legal cases that could lead to her removal from office in coming weeks.
abstract: Tens of thousands of supporters of Thai Prime Min Yingluck Shinawatra gather for three-day rally on outskirts of Bangkok aimed at countering months of sometimes violent antigovernment protests; demonstrators say they are prepared to thwart any move to dismiss Yingluck, who faces mounting legal cases.
lead_paragraph: The government supporters said they were prepared to thwart any move to dismiss Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, who faces mounting legal cases that could lead to her removal from office in coming weeks.

headline.main: Thais Rally in Support of Beleaguered Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: Thais Rally in Support of Beleaguered Prime Minister
